question: Which Indian has been ranked at the top spot, as per the International Boxing Associationâ€™s latest World rankings (52kg)?
explanation:
Ace Indian boxer and World championships silver medallist Amit Panghal is ranked at the first spot, in men's 52kg category, as per the latest world rankings released by the International Boxing Association (AIBA).
Worlds silver medallist Manju Rani has been placed at the second rank in 48 kg category. Legendary boxer Mary Kom is placed at third place. Kavinder Bisht, Deepak and Manish Kaushik also found place in the top ten ranks in their categories.
